title: Mr. Hau
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, Fast food, Take-out, Asian
description: Opened June 2013 in a lower ground space near the tram station IP Pavlova and Brussels. Serves vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, and desserts. Self serve buffet weekdays 11am-3pm. Reportedly not part of the larger international chain of Loving Hut vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai. Previously named Loving Hut - Koubkova.
